Yes, the two books are different. But, the difference is elusive!
thank you. this one looks sufficient for me :)

Awesome dude!  you just saved me $134 !! and I am so poor, so thank you so much my friend.  idk if you found the pdf somewhere or scanned it yourself, but this is the real thing.
